phrs.translation: 沉稳睡眠香熏复方精油
舒缓压力香熏复方精油

sentences.sentence: Waste (chopped up into small pieces if it is solid) is fed into this plasma. The heat and electric charges of the plasma break the chemical bonds in the waste, vaporising it.
sentences.translation: 废物（如果是固体则切割成小块）被放入等离子体化的空气中，等离子体的热能和电荷会将废物组织的化学键打破，从而使之蒸发消失。
